name: Studio kitchen
description:
Studio Kitchen is a timeloop adventure game where you have to explore your small one room apartment to find a way to break out of a never ending 5 minute loop.

Listen to rock music, enjoy some 'special' meat, and talk about movies with your best bud jimmy who lives in your microwave and used to be in the mafia.

Features Include:

  • Adventure
  • Mystery 
  • Clocks
  • Eating cigarettes out of the garbage 

this game is based off of a series of dreams, nightmares, and hallucinations i've had over the past year or so

Content Warning

  • Loud/High Pitched Noises
  • Swearing/Sexual humor
  • Drug use/reference
  • Some shocking sequences

Controls:

F - pick up item/interact 

Tab - open/close inventory

WASD - movin around

Mouse - lookin around

Right mouse button - clickin on stuff

Space - jump
